info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 1:02PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Broome and northeastern Susquehanna Counties through 130 PM EDT... At 102 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kirkwood, or near Binghamton, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Binghamton, Kirkwood, Conklin, Susquehanna, Susquehanna Depot, Windsor, Great Bend, Lanesboro, Sanitaria Springs and Hickory Grove. This includes the following highway exits... New York Interstate 81 between 1 and 3. Interstate 86/Route 17 between 75 and 82. Interstate 88 near 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central New York...and northeastern Pennsylvania.
